products.name: Apple iPhone 13 Pro
products.description: The iPhone 13 Pro features a stunning Super Retina XDR display, 5G connectivity, and A15 Bionic chip. It also has an impressive camera system with Night mode, Deep Fusion, and ProRAW capabilities.

products.name: Sony WH-1000XM4 Wireless Noise Cancelling Headphones
products.description: These headphones feature industry-leading noise cancellation technology, 30 hours of battery life, and touch controls. They also have high-resolution audio and support for voice assistants.

products.name: Instant Pot Duo Nova Pressure Cooker
products.description: This pressure cooker features 7-in-1 functionality and can be used as a pressure cooker, slow cooker, rice cooker, steamer, saut√© pan, food warmer, and yogurt maker. It has a large capacity and is easy to use and clean.

products.name: Samsung 55-Inch QLED Q60A Smart TV
products.description: This smart TV features a Quantum Processor 4K, 100% Color Volume with Quantum Dot, and dual LED backlighting technology. It also has built-in Alexa and supports AirPlay 2.

products.name: Fitbit Charge 5 Advanced Health & Fitness Tracker
products.description: This fitness tracker features 20+ exercise modes, built-in GPS, and continuous heart rate tracking. It also has a six-day battery life, sleep tracking, and supports notifications from your phone.

products.name: Nespresso Vertuo Coffee and Espresso Maker
products.description: This coffee and espresso maker features Centrifusion technology for a perfect brew every time. It also has a large water tank, easy one-touch operation, and comes with a variety of coffee capsules.
